about_the_game:
Shape the history of the Hollywood movie industry in this sandbox business simulation game. Create the movies you've always wanted to see, hire the best team, research cutting-edge technologies, and dominate the Box Office. Can you rise from a small studio to a Hollywood giant?

Available Features in the Demo:

  • Greenlight Your Movie: Pick the theme, genres, target audience, and budget size of your project.

  • Talent Casting: Cast the perfect director and actors for your movie based on their domestic and international popularity, critical recognition, and their affinity for the script.

  • Budget Allocation: Optimize how you spend your budget on production.

  • Staff Management: Hire and allocate employees to perform tasks based on their skill sets (Analysts, Sales).

  • Trend Forecasting: Better understand upcoming genre and theme trends by putting your best analysts to work.

  • WIP Production Feature System: Play with the first iteration of our production feature system, which lets you research advanced techniques to use on your movie.

  • Incidents: Adapt and react to unexpected studio or industry-wide incidents.
